ingredients: 5  overripe Fuyu persimmons, mashed, 1 small Granny Smith apple, peeled and diced, 1 tablespoon brown sugar, 2 teaspoons ground cinnamon, 1 teaspoon freshly grated ginger,   +   1/2  lemon, juiced,   +   1/2 teaspoon lemon zest
